scripts.dev-estoqueuni: npm run kill-ports && concurrently -n backend,frontend "npm run backend:dev" "npm run frontend:dev:wait"
scripts.deploy-estoqueuni: npm run test && npm run prebuild && vite build --config vite.config.estoqueuni.js && npm run postbuild
scripts.deploy-estoqueuni-dev: npm run test && npm run prebuild && vite build --mode staging --config vite.config.estoqueuni.js && npm run postbuild-dev
scripts.prebuild: npm --prefix ../../../frontend_project run clean:lixo && npm --prefix ../../../frontend_project run enable-upload
scripts.postbuild: bash ../../../frontend_project/upload-via-ssh.sh estoqueuni-www && npm --prefix ../../../frontend_project run disable-upload && ssh Linode_dallas 'pm2 restart estoqueuni || pm2 start npm --name estoqueuni --cwd /home/claudio/apiNegocios360/apps/estoqueuni/backend -- start'
scripts.postbuild-dev: bash ../../../frontend_project/upload-via-ssh.sh estoqueuni-dev && npm --prefix ../../../frontend_project run disable-upload && ssh Linode_dallas 'pm2 restart estoqueuni-dev || pm2 start npm --name estoqueuni-dev --cwd /home/claudio/apiNegocios360/apps/estoqueuni/backend -- start'
